goal.en: “Financial statements not only bridge the gap between investors, creditors, and other interested parties, but also assist them in decision making. This course will guide the learners to understand what financial statements are, to know how financial statements are prepared, and to analyze information in the financial statements. 1.Train the ability to apply the fundamental knowledge in business management to the analysis, reporting, and interpretation of business activities. 2.Train the ability to comprehend and apply accounting and auditing standards 3.Enhance the ability to read and express in English, and awareness of professional ethics and social responsibilities“
goal.ch: “在資本市場中，財務報表不僅為股東、債權人、管理者、主管機關及其他利害關係人建立了一個溝通橋樑，亦幫助其作投資、融資、與管理等決策。本課程主要在引導初學者認識財務報表、瞭解財務報表係如何產生、及學習如何閱讀與應用財務報表的資訊。 1.培養企業活動之分析、報導與解釋能力 2.培養會審準則之理解與應用能力 3.強化英語閱讀與表達能力，以及職業道德與社會責任之認知能力“

content.en:
“The courses Accounting I, II focus on ways in which accounting principles are used in business operations. Students can learn the following Parts.
Part 1: ACCOUNTING in BUSINESS
Part 2: ACCOUNTING PROCEDURES
Part 3: ACCOUNTING for MERCHANDISING OPERATIONS
Part 4: INVENTORIES and COST of SALES
Part 5: ACCOUNTING for RECEIVABLES
Part 6: ACCOUNTING for LONG-TERM ASSETS
Part 7: CURRENT LIABILITIES
Part 8: LONG-TERM LIABILITIES
Part 9: ACCOUNTING for CORPORATIONS
Part 10: REPORTING the STATEMENT of CASH FLOWS
Part 11: PARTS FOR FURTHER STUDY (optional)
Cash and Internal Controls
Financial Statement Analysis
Investments
Accounting Ethics
Part 12:Examination
Part 13:Holidays“
